ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend the class for anyone who wants to get some basics in neuroimaging studies; if they were actually planning to head down the path of neuroimaging, they would probably need to take much more in-depth classes.
Overview of many current imaging techniques and studies. Excellent for evaluating the strengths and limitations of each modality.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It will make reading neuroimaging papers much easier! It also gave me a good overview of the state of the field at the moment; while that's probably going to change very quickly, I feel like I have a better grasp of the limitations and the current questions in neuroimaging that people are trying to get at.
